00040 namespace PACC {

00042     namespace SVG {

00044         using namespace std;
00045         
00049         class Transform : public string {
00050          public:
00051             Transform operator+(const Transform& inTransform);
00052             Transform& operator+=(const Transform& inTransform);
00053             
00054          protected:
00055             // restricted usage
00056             Transform(const string& inName, const string& inValue);
00057         };
00058         
00061         class Rotate : public Transform {
00062          public:
00063             Rotate(double inAngle);
00064             Rotate(double inAngle, const Point& inPoint);
00065             Rotate(double inAngle, double inX, double inY);
00066         };
00067         
00074         class Translate : public Transform {
00075          public:
00076             Translate(const Point& inPoint);
00077             Translate(double inX, double inY);
00078         };
00079         
00082         class Scale : public Transform {
00083          public:
00084             Scale(double inScale);
00085             Scale(double inX, double inY);
00086         };
00087         
00090         class SkewX : public Transform {
00091          public:
00092             SkewX(double inAngle);
00093         };
00094         
00097         class SkewY : public Transform {
00098          public:
00099             SkewY(double inAngle);
00100         };
00101         
00104         class MatrixTransform : public Transform {
00105          public:
00106             MatrixTransform(double inA, double inB, double inC, double inD, 
00107                             double inE, double inF);
00108         };
